channel.title: Project 16 v6 HELP!
channel.description:
if i click 'start server' it goes 0,2 sec to something, i think a error (can't make pic). But i can say what's says if i edit:
[code]@echo off title yourservername echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / echo / Now compiling server... echo / echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / echo / Now starting server... echo / echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/code]
What i have to replace it? Please help me :([br][size=1]Posted at: December 10, 2006, 04:45:51 AM[/size][hr]some1 help plz..

item.title: Project 16 v6 HELP!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i have the fixer source 4 u:

@echo off
title Run&Compile by Jakkie123 - Specially maked for Baloeh
color 0c

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /                                                                             \
echo /                               Now compiling server...                       \
echo /                                                                             \
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /                                                                             \
echo /                              Now starting server...                         \
echo /                                                                             \
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server
pause

you need to change in the line: [tt]“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java[/tt] the text: [tt]09[/tt] with your own version of JDK

Read full topic
